attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A law passed by your government is going to be openly broken on Boxing Day.  The e petitions team have banned me from mentioning by whom, where or what law.  The person breaking the law is doing so because it is one of the most idiotic laws you have ever passed.  He is going to break it openly.  Stop passing idiotic laws that pervert the very meaning of crime.  They are an insult both to yourself and the people you are meant to govern.
